data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Adalberto J., Nogueira, André A. (2008): Three new species, new records and notes on the nursery-web spider genus Architis in Brazil (Araneae: Pisauridae). Zootaxa 1815: 51-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182889
